paper_abstract: We establish sufficient conditions for polynomial rate of convergence to a stationary distribution and of beta-mixing in continuous-time Erlang-type systems. Our results are a natural complement both to results of Erlang himself, dating back to the beginning of the 20th century, and to exponential estimates established later.
paper_title: On the rate of beta-mixing and convergence to a stationary distribution in continuous-time Erlang-type systems
